name: Virtual Dream Center 2.1
description:
Virtual Dream Center is an online art center. 

"Virtual Dream Center 2.1" features the following virtual exhibitions :

RAPHAËL FABRE : "THE CURATOR (INTRODUCTION)"
FLEURYFONTAINE : "LES ELEMENTS TOMBENT DU CIEL"
BAPTISTE CACCIA : "ALLER-RETOUR"
GRIG : "SUMMONING AKU AKU"
JEAN-BAPTISTE LENGLET : "ENDLESS COLLAGE CITY"

www.virtualdreamcenter.xyz
